Title: Armored Personnel Unit (APU)
Description: A hydraulic walker with dual 30mm cannons, Neo and Zion’s line of defense against Sentinels in Zion’s battle.

Title: Lightning Rifle
Description: A directed-energy weapon firing lightning bursts, used by Zion to destroy Sentinels or foes like Cypher.

Title: Electromagnetic Pulse (EMP)
Description: A hovercraft-mounted device that disables Machines and Sentinels with a massive energy surge.

Title: Tow Bomb
Description: Homing explosive launched by Sentinels, capable of crippling Zion hovercrafts like the Nebuchadnezzar.

Title: Mouse’s Dual Automatic Shotguns
Description: Custom 12-gauge rotary shotguns Mouse wielded in the lobby, firing 900 rounds per minute.

Title: Agent’s Desert Eagle
Description: The .50 AE pistol favored by Agents, a powerful sidearm for enforcing Matrix control.

Title: Dual Rocket Launcher
Description: A Machine weapon from the Second Renaissance, firing twin rockets to devastate human forces.

Title: Code Bomb
Description: A digital explosive used in the Matrix to disrupt systems, seen in The Matrix Online.

Title: Matrix Operator Terminal
Description: The green-code screens operators use to monitor and hack the Matrix simulation.

Title: Nebuchadnezzar Hovercraft System
Description: The ship’s control system for navigation and Matrix jacking, central to Neo’s journey.

Title: Construct Training Program
Description: A blank simulator for loading weapons and skills, used to train Neo and Trinity.

Title: Sentinel
Description: Tentacled Machines with cutting lasers, hunting Zion ships in the real world.

Title: Power Plant
Description: Massive towers harvesting human bioelectricity to power Machine City 01.

Title: Docbot
Description: Mechanical tenders maintaining human pods in the power plant, ejecting the awakened.

Title: Neural Plug
Description: The interface connecting humans to the Matrix via headjacks, essential for jacking in.
